picked_headlines.summary: Real-world AI agents break due to memory drift, unreliable tools, evaluation difficulties, cost/latency limits & trust erosion. System design > model tuning.
picked_headlines.reason_for_choice: Highlights practical challenges in deploying AI agents, relevant to both technical and management audiences. It emphasizes system design over model tuning, a crucial point for successful AI implementation.

picked_headlines.summary: AI-native productivity suite unifying tools with intelligent chat, project management, file sharing, and workflow automation. Integrates with Google Meet.
picked_headlines.reason_for_choice: Showcases a real-world application of AI in a productivity suite. It is a tangible example of how AI is being integrated into everyday tools, appealing to a broad audience.

digest:
*TabiBERT*: A Large-Scale ModernBERT Foundation Model and Unified Benchmarking Framework for Turkish. See more at: https://arxiv.org/abs/2512.23065

*PatchBlock*: A Lightweight Defense Against Adversarial Patches for Embedded EdgeAI Devices. Check it out: https://arxiv.org/abs/2601.00367

*FlashInfer-Bench*: Building the Virtuous Cycle for AI-driven LLM Systems. Find details here: https://arxiv.org/abs/2601.00227

*Yahtzee* as RL benchmark: A2C robustly trains self-play agents, nearing optimal scores. Challenges remain in long-horizon credit assignment: https://arxiv.org/abs/2601.00007

*VisNet*: Efficient person ReID model using feature fusion, semantic clustering, and dynamic multi-task learning. Achieves 87.05% Rank-1 on Market-1501: https://arxiv.org/abs/2601.00307

*The Trojan in the Vocabulary*: Stealthy Sabotage of LLM Composition: https://arxiv.org/abs/2601.00065

*AnyMS*: Training-free framework for layout-guided multi-subject customization: https://arxiv.org/abs/2512.23537

*DepFlow* mitigates semantic bias in depression detection by disentangling speech generation: https://arxiv.org/abs/2601.00303

*Satellite to Street*: Disaster Impact Estimator: https://arxiv.org/abs/2512.00065

Deep learning model (Swin Transformer) for skin disease classification achieved 87.71% accuracy on ISIC2019: https://arxiv.org/abs/2601.00286

*StockBot 2.0*: Vanilla LSTMs Outperform Transformer-based Forecasting for Stock Prices: https://arxiv.org/abs/2601.00197

*Deep Delta Learning* (DDL) modulates residual connections with a learnable geometric transformation: https://arxiv.org/abs/2601.00417

*Memory Bank Compression* for Continual Adaptation of Large Language Models: https://arxiv.org/abs/2601.00756

Semantic methods enhance team sports tactics by modeling tactical configurations as semantic structures: https://arxiv.org/abs/2601.00421

Addresses key considerations for large-scale photonic AI: dynamic tensor support, overhead management, and hardware robustness: https://arxiv.org/abs/2601.00129

*UltraGS*: Real-time ultrasound novel view synthesis using Gaussian Splatting with physics-inspired acoustic modeling: https://arxiv.org/abs/2511.07743

*Agentu*: Python framework for building AI agents with sequential/parallel steps, sessions, evaluation, observability, skills, and tool search: https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=46495628

Ask HN: Why don't we have "Guilds" for solo AI founders yet?: https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=46497617

AI creates "unhackable code" (Void Shield) that self-destructs under analysis: https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=46496612

*Agentic AI* uses RAG to 'know' and MCP to 'do,' enabling actions based on retrieved knowledge: https://toknow.ai/posts/rag-agents-mcp/

*MCPs* extend beyond IDEs, integrating AI into dev workflows across platforms: https://www.oreilly.com/radar/mcps-for-developers-who-think-they-dont-need-mcps/

Molly Graham's frameworks for leading through chaos, change, and scale: https://www.lennysnewsletter.com/p/the-high-growth-handbook-molly-graham
